title: Xphyrus
details: Developed microservices using ASP.NET Core with RabbitMQ and MS SQL for backend.
Deployed Kubernetes cluster on Azure with Persistent Volumes and Nginx for load balancing.
Built a Golang RCE engine for containerized code execution under 1 second.

title: Xyfin
details: Developed RESTful APIs with Gin, JWT/PASETO authentication, and unit tests.
Deployed using Docker on AKS with GitHub Actions for CI/CD.
Integrated gRPC services, Redis queuing, and background workers for task management.

title: Aerial2Map
details: Implemented Pix2Pix GAN with U-Net for generator and PatchGAN for discriminator.
Trained on 256x256 RGB inputs, achieving improvements in map realism over 20 epochs.

title: PulseGuard
description: IoT-Based Remote Pulse Rate Monitoring System
details: Developed using MongoDB Timeseries for storing readings and HighChartsJs for visualization.
Programmed ESP32 to send readings via REST API with WhatsApp message alerts.

title: Ray Tracer
details: Developed a basic ray tracer using C++ and SDL2 for rendering and visualization.
Implemented ray-sphere intersection, shading, and reflection algorithms.

title: Traffic Analyst Tool
details: Built using Node.js, Express.js, and MongoDB for backend.
Integrated Bing Maps API and Azure Maps for real-time traffic data analysis.
